review: Old is gold, very well proved, nice location, tasty food, homely staff, one can have the view of lake, garden and snow capped himalayan peaks, no traffic pollution, very very comfortable to stay with nice food
name: hamsafarSundernagar

review: One can get Lunch or Dinner, whenever you want, being on NH 21, you can have food without the Time Limit. Food is tasty as well as at very reasonable price, with lot's of choices, service is good, Staff is helpful.
name: hamsafarSundernagar
